scripts.deploy-aurora: yarn codegen-aurora && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ stevenwal/gnosis-auction-aurora aurora.yaml
scripts.deploy-mainnet: yarn codegen-mainnet && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ stevenwal/gnosis-auction mainnet.yaml
scripts.deploy-avax: yarn codegen-avax && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ stevenwal/gnosis-auction-avax avax.yaml
scripts.deploy-kovan: yarn codegen-kovan && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ stevenwal/gnosis-auction-kovan kovan.yaml
scripts.deploy-fuji: yarn codegen-fuji && graph deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ stevenwal/gnosis-auction-fuji fuji.yaml
scripts.deploy: yarn deploy-mainnet && yarn deploy-avax && yarn deploy-kovan && yarn deploy-fuji
